author: ajith
msg: 1. Added the necesary methods to the SchemaCompiler.java
2. Added a resource to internationalize some messages
3. Updated the ADBBeanTemplate.xsl to include only the non inherited properties
4. Updated the access modifier to be protected rather than private
5. Did some minor improvements to the logic of the BeanWriterMetaInfoHolder.java
This is an empty revision for padding.

author: jeremias
msg: Bugfix: LineArea used a private field instead of the start-indent trait which caused problems for centered and right-aligned text when rendering is done from the intermediate format. The AreaTreeParser parses and sets the trait but not the startIndent field on LineArea, so I removed the startIndent field.
